remarks: If three real numbers are less than a fourth real number, the sum of the three real numbers is less then three times the third real number. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 11-Dec-2019.)
statement:
lt3addmuld.a $e |- ( ph -> A e. RR ) $.
lt3addmuld.b $e |- ( ph -> B e. RR ) $.
lt3addmuld.c $e |- ( ph -> C e. RR ) $.
lt3addmuld.d $e |- ( ph -> D e. RR ) $.
lt3addmuld.altd $e |- ( ph -> A < D ) $.
lt3addmuld.bltd $e |- ( ph -> B < D ) $.
lt3addmuld.cltd $e |- ( ph -> C < D ) $.
lt3addmuld $p |- ( ph -> ( ( A + B ) + C ) < ( 3 x. D ) ) $.
